reference: Duolingo is scientifically proven to work

owlHead: Boost your learning with Super Duolingo
superDuoPara: Learning a language on Duolingo is completely free, but you can remove ads and support free education with Super. First 2 weeks on us!

computerPara: Free teacher tools to help students learn languages through the Duolingo app, both in and out of the classroom.
